aka: Rhinoceros Horn and Cattle Gallstone Pill

actions: Drains Heat, resolves Fire toxicity, vaporizes Phlegm and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
With She Xiang, Ru Xiang and Mo Yao, for boils, carbuncles, fibrocystic breast disease and a wide variety of painful swellings.
Activates the Blood, dissipates masses, reduces swellings, detoxifies, opens the channels, stops pain and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
With Ru Xiang and Mo Yao, for carbuncles, sores and hot swellings.
Invigorates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi, relaxes the sinews, invigorates the channels, reduces swelling, generates flesh and alleviates pain.
With Mo Yao, for Blood Stasis obstructing the channels with epigastric, flank abdominal and joint pain.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, alleviates pain, reduces swelling, generates flesh and promotes healing.
Inhibits the growth of cancer cells

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Qi, Yin and Blood Deficiencies.
Contraindicated for those whose ulcers have broken open with exudate.
Do not take for a long time.

notes: *Moschus She Xiang comes from an endangered species. Substitutes should be used.
